Package io.spring.initializr.web.controller

Project generation controllers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMetadataController
    A base controller that uses a InitializrMetadataProvider.
    CommandLineMetadataController
    Controller that handles assistance for CLI support using a CommandLineHelpGenerator.
    DefaultProjectGenerationController
    A default ProjectGenerationController that uses a standard ProjectRequest to map parameters of a project generation request.
    ProjectGenerationController<R extends ProjectRequest>
    Base Controller that provides endpoints for project generation.
    ProjectMetadataController
    Controller that exposes metadata and service configuration.
    SpringCliDistributionController
    Controller that provides access to the Spring CLI.

Package io.spring.initializr.web.controller Description

Project generation controllers.
